content: Provide the correct APA citation for a website with the title "Introduction to Machine Learning" that can be found at the web address www.machinelearning.org.

To cite a website in APA format, you'll need to include the author (if available), publication date, title of the webpage, website name, and the URL. If there is no author, you can start with the title of the webpage. Here's how you can format the citation for the given website:

Machine Learning. (n.d.). *Introduction to machine learning*. Retrieved [Month Day, Year], from http://www.machinelearning.org

Note: Replace "[Month Day, Year]" with the date you accessed the website. If the website provides a specific publication or update date, replace "(n.d.)" with that date.
